pages.text: The $(item)Heart of the Sea$() can be obtained from a buried treasure. $(br2)The location is marked with a noticeable red $(l)X$() on a buried $(item)Treasure Map$(), which is found in $(thing)Ocean Ruins$() and $(thing)Shipwrecks$(). $(br2)Feeding $(item)Raw Cod$() or $(item)Raw Salmon$() to a $(thing)Dolphin$() causes them to swim toward the nearest structure.
$(br)The heart be used to craft a $(item)Conduit$().
